text: William Henry Ord (1803–9 November 1838) was a British politician, who represented Newport in Parliament from 1832 until 1837. Ord died at his father's residence, Whitfield Hall in Northumberland, on 9 November 1838. He was aged 35. == References == Category:1803 births Category:1838 deaths Category:Members of the House of Commons of the United Kingdom
title: William Henry Ord (1803–1838)
